/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene from a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the urban landscape. The road is flanked by trees and buildings, adding a touch of nature and architecture to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the busy street below.
